summary: Removes learned perks so you do not manual have to console command them all out. Useful in \"respecing\" your characters perks.
descriptionHtml:
MAKE SURE YOU SAVE YOUR GAME BEFORE YOU RUN THIS SCRIPT. I am 100% certain it does not mess up your game or disable your achievements as I have tested it, but I do not want you to mess up your game anyway!

I do not very much wish to cheat in this game per say, but I did want to spice my game up a bit and enjoy a different play style, so instead of removing all my perks 1 at a time with console commands i just created this script file to ease the pain. 

Simply copy respec.txt into your skyrim executable folder (ex: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam2\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim) run skyrim, and open your console prompt (typically by pressing `) and type in:

bat respec

After this all of you perks should be removed but you will be at 0 perks available, so you can regain your perk count by console commands or downloading this great addon: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=745 and doing it that way.

You may have to run the console command a few times to get rid of all the perks, and also make sure you are not in your perk menu when running the command.

Edit: I\'ve just noticed other mods that are more sophisticated than this one in Skills and leveling. I\'ll just leave this up for now, just wanted to be clear I did not see the other mods ahead of time and the name was purely coincidental to Kaenil\'s \"Inelegant Respec\". So just take your pick on your preferred method of removing/adding perks. =)
author: Redhill
